mapper.select: SELECT USE_STPLAT_ID, USE_STPLAT_NM, USE_STPLAT_CN, INFO_PROVD_AGRE_CN, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNSTPLATINFO WHERE USE_STPLAT_ID=#{useStplatId}

SELECT USE_STPLAT_ID, USE_STPLAT_NM, USE_STPLAT_CN, INFO_PROVD_AGRE_CN, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,STP.* FROM ( SELECT USE_STPLAT_ID, USE_STPLAT_NM, TO_CHAR(USE_STPLAT_CN) USE_STPLAT_CN, TO_CHAR(INFO_PROVD_AGRE_CN) INFO_PROVD_AGRE_CN, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNSTPLATINFO WHERE 1=1
AND USE_STPLAT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND USE_STPLAT_CN LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY USE_STPLAT_NM DESC ) STP ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{recordCountPerPage} and RNUM > #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM LETTNSTPLATINFO WHERE 1=1
AND RECOMEND_SITE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND RECOMEND_SITE_URL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNSTPLATINFO (USE_STPLAT_ID , USE_STPLAT_NM , USE_STPLAT_CN , INFO_PROVD_AGRE_CN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES ( #{useStplatId} , #{useStplatNm} , #{useStplatCn} , #{infoProvdAgreCn} , sysdate , #{frstRegisterId} , sysdate , #{lastUpdusrId} )
